data.name: Defeat 10 Pokemon on Kanto Route 1 (Town Map)
Purchase the Dungeon Ticket in Viridian City (Dungeon Ticket)
Defeat 10 Pokemon on Kanto Route 12 (Super Rod)
Defeat 10 Pokemon on Kanto Route 3 (Mystery Egg)
Clear the Fuchsia City Gym in Kanto (Safari Ticket)
Purchase the Explorer Kit on Cinnabar Island (Explorer Kit)
Clear the Viridian City Gym in Kanto (Gem Case)
data.requires: {viridian_city()} and |Thunder Badge| and |Rainbow Badge| and |Marsh Badge| and {completed_bills_errand()}

data.name: Clear the Victory Road dungeon in Kanto (Holo Caster)
Purchase the Explosive Charge on Cinnabar Island (Explosive Charge)
Purchase the Treasure Scanner on Cinnabar Island (Treasure Scanner)
